examples.example: 我不小心碰倒了他的杯子，赶紧说对不起。

translate.english: I accidentally knocked over his cup and quickly said sorry.

examples.example: 我急忙追上前面的人，真诚地说对不起，因为刚才无意间撞到了他。

translate.english: I hurriedly caught up with the person in front and sincerely said sorry because I accidentally bumped into him just now.

examples.example: 我不小心犯了一个小错误，连忙真诚地说对不起。

translate.english: I accidentally made a small mistake and hurriedly and sincerely said sorry.
